This app demonstrates:

1. All parameters of `input_action_link`:
   - `id`: Required identifier for the link
   - `label`: Required text to display on the link
   - `icon`: Optional icon to display with the link
   - `**kwargs`: Additional HTML attributes (not shown since they're optional)

2. The app shows:
   - A clickable link with an icon
   - A text output showing the number of times the link has been clicked

3. The app includes Font Awesome for the icon display

4. The app uses express mode and minimal components

The app will display a link that, when clicked, increments a counter. The counter value is displayed below the link. The link includes an icon from Font Awesome for visual enhancement.

This is a minimal implementation that shows all the core functionality of `input_action_link` without any unnecessary components.
